### Create tibble from simple, 1-level list
```{r}
library(tibble)

A = list(letters[1:10])
(TA = tibble(A))

## probe
str(TA)
TA$A
```

### Create tibble from 2-level list
```{r}
B = list(A, list(LETTERS[10:20]))
B
str(B)
# List of 2
#  $ :List of 1
#   ..$ : chr [1:10] "a" "b" "c" "d" ...
#  $ :List of 1
#   ..$ : chr [1:11] "J" "K" "L" "M" ...
# NULL

(TB = tibble(B))

### Rmk
q=quote(letters[10:19])
(C = list(A, letters[1:10], eval(q), list(eval(q)) ))
(TC = tibble(C))
```
